summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game where a character, equipped with a staff and wearing armor, is exploring a rocky, dimly lit environment. There are two lit torches in the area, providing some illumination. The interface displays various icons and a health bar at the bottom left, while the bottom right shows additional icons, likely representing abilities or items. A notification on the right side of the screen indicates that the player has gained "+4 Will" and currently has "x18" Will. A red-dotted circle highlights an object or area of interest in the environment.
